channel.title: sprig on Stencil
channel.description: Recent content in sprig on Stencil

item.title: append
item.description: An example appending single values: {{$s:=slice"a""b""c"}} {{$s=$s|append"d""e"}} {{/* $s now contains a []string with elements "a", "b", "c", "d", and "e" */}} The same example appending a slice to a slice: {{$s:=slice"a""b""c"}} {{$s=$s|append(slice"d""e")}} The append function works for all types
